author: BBT
title: Issue 75
text:
Welcome to the March/April issue of Buying Business Travel 
This issue includes UK post-Election analysis, a report on the current Open Skies dispute, and managing travel in Africa.We explore travel buyers’ concerns about RFPs for airlines, hotels and TMCs. And we look at new flexi-time hotel booking tools, and managing your ground transport programme.Plus there are all the regulars: news, reviews and interviews, analysis, advice and more. 
Read the digital edition here Digital edition sponsored by : 
We hope you find the issue informative and engaging – as always, your feedback is welcome: contact editor Paul Revel at prevel@panaceapublishing.com
